function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Socio-economic divide affecting housing options and access to home delivery","Impact":"Increased disparity in living conditions and potential health risks for socio-economically disadvantaged individuals","Mitigation":"Implement policies and programs to provide affordable and safe housing options for all income levels","Technologies":"Urban planning and affordable housing initiatives","People":"Socio-economically disadvantaged individuals","Owner":"Government and urban planning authorities"},{"Description":"Cutting corners in affordable/social housing developments","Impact":"Potential public health disadvantages for occupants due to compromised building safety and hygiene","Mitigation":"Enforce building regulations and quality standards for affordable housing developments","Technologies":"Building inspection technologies and construction quality management systems","People":"Occupants of affordable/social housing developments","Owner":"Government and housing developers"}]}
